headline.main: France Seeks to Form Coalition of Ambition, Carbon Price
headline.print_headline: France Seeks to Form Coalition of Ambition, Carbon Price

docs.snippet: France will revise its domestic goals for cutting greenhouse gases by 2020 and will seek to build a coalition of nations striving for a global carbon price to accelerate a shift toward greener energy, French President Hollande said on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: France will revise its domestic goals for cutting greenhouse gases by 2020 and will seek to build a coalition of nations striving for a global carbon price to accelerate a shift toward greener energy, French President Hollande said on Saturday.

headline.main: Scouts Ban on Advocacy Could Hurt Group's Bid for Troop
headline.print_headline: Scouts Ban on Advocacy Could Hurt Group's Bid for Troop

docs.snippet: The Boy Scouts of America announced revised rules this week to emphasize a duty to God and ban political advocacy, leaving a Utah organizer who applied for a troop with gay leaders wondering if applications like his are targeted....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Boy Scouts of America announced revised rules this week to emphasize a duty to God and ban political advocacy, leaving a Utah organizer who applied for a troop with gay leaders wondering if applications like his are targeted.

headline.main: No. 22 Louisville Cruises Past Eastern Michigan 86-53
headline.print_headline: No. 22 Louisville Cruises Past Eastern Michigan 86-53

docs.snippet: Damion Lee scored 16 points, all in the second half, and No. 22 Louisville shot 53 percent from the field to overwhelm Eastern Michigan 86-53 on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Damion Lee scored 16 points, all in the second half, and No. 22 Louisville shot 53 percent from the field to overwhelm Eastern Michigan 86-53 on Saturday.

headline.main: Venezuelan President Addresses Military After Election Loss
headline.print_headline: Venezuelan President Addresses Military After Election Loss

docs.snippet: President Nicolas Maduro on Saturday told Venezuela's military to be prepared for a fight as the country remains tense after a landslide defeat for his socialist party in congressional elections....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Nicolas Maduro on Saturday told Venezuela's military to be prepared for a fight as the country remains tense after a landslide defeat for his socialist party in congressional elections.

headline.main: Wisconsin Gun Shop to Pay $1M to Settle Officers' Lawsuit
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Gun Shop to Pay $1M to Settle Officers' Lawsuit

docs.snippet: A Wisconsin gun shop will pay $1 million to settle a lawsuit in which a jury found it negligently sold a gun used to injure two Milwaukee police officers, the store's attorney said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Wisconsin gun shop will pay $1 million to settle a lawsuit in which a jury found it negligently sold a gun used to injure two Milwaukee police officers, the store's attorney said.

headline.main: Kerry Calls Climate Accord a Victory

docs.snippet: John Kerry, the secretary of state, lauded the climate agreement reached by world leaders in Paris on Saturday as "a victory for all of the planet and for future generations."...

keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: John Kerry, the secretary of state, lauded the climate agreement reached by world leaders in Paris on Saturday as "a victory for all of the planet and for future generations."

headline.main: Woman Charged With Attempted Murder in Failed Abortion
headline.print_headline: Woman Charged With Attempted Murder in Failed Abortion

docs.snippet: A Tennessee woman is charged with attempted first-degree murder for what investigators say was a failed abortion attempt....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Tennessee woman is charged with attempted first-degree murder for what investigators say was a failed abortion attempt.

headline.main: Hield Leads No. 7 Oklahoma Past Oral Roberts 96-73
headline.print_headline: Hield Leads No. 7 Oklahoma Past Oral Roberts 96-73

docs.snippet: Buddy Hield had 30 points and a career-high five steals to help No. 7 Oklahoma beat Oral Roberts 96-73 on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Buddy Hield had 30 points and a career-high five steals to help No. 7 Oklahoma beat Oral Roberts 96-73 on Saturday.

headline.main: Pro-Gun Group Stages Fake Shooting in Texas to Push Firearm Rights
headline.print_headline: Pro-Gun Group Stages Fake Shooting in Texas to Push Firearm Rights

docs.snippet: Pro-gun advocates doused fake victims with fake blood outside the University of Texas on Saturday in what they called a theatrical event to show the need for firearms on campus....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pro-gun advocates doused fake victims with fake blood outside the University of Texas on Saturday in what they called a theatrical event to show the need for firearms on campus.

headline.main: No. 11 Purdue Beats Youngstown State 95-64, Goes 11-0
headline.print_headline: No. 11 Purdue Beats Youngstown State 95-64, Goes 11-0

docs.snippet: Freshman Caleb Swanigan and senior A.J. Hammons both scored 15 points to lead four Purdue players in double figures and the 11th-ranked Boilermakers remained unbeaten with a 95-64 victory over Youngstown State on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Freshman Caleb Swanigan and senior A.J. Hammons both scored 15 points to lead four Purdue players in double figures and the 11th-ranked Boilermakers remained unbeaten with a 95-64 victory over Youngstown State on Saturday.
